thread.title: Tucker Destroys Sierra Club Executive Trying to Defend Abortion and Illegal Aliens
thread.title_full: Tucker Destroys Sierra Club Executive Trying to Defend Abortion and Illegal Aliens

author: Ben Marquis
title: Tucker Destroys Sierra Club Executive Trying to Defend Abortion and Illegal Aliens
text:
FEINKENSTEIN: 200-Person Mob of Angry Dems Shows Up at Her Own Home 
You can watch the entire segment right here: 
As to the abortion as population control notion, Louder With Crowder noted that it seemed an awful lot like eugenics, prompting a series of “translations” of what Brune actually meant but couldn’t actually say. 
“Translation: kill your children, save the planet. Even more translation: save the whales by killing babies. More: save a plant, kill a child. Nope, not done yet. The Sierra Club: We love trees, we hate babies. Empowering the environment by murdering people. ‘ At the Sierra Club, we care about women’s rights. So please snuff your baby girl in the womb. Just think about all the napkins you’ll spare by cutting her up in the womb,’” he wrote. 
As an added bonus, The Daily Caller noted that Brune and the Sierra Club’s staunch opposition to Trump’s immigration policies, such as a border wall, was markedly different than the position they held just four years ago, when they were staunch advocates of a border wall and tough immigration controls to help better protect the environment in the U.S. 
Once again, Carlson succeeded in exposing a left-wing loon for the partisan hack they really are, making it crystal clear that the current Sierra Club is less concerned with saving the planet than they are with promoting a progressive agenda, and will choose that agenda over the climate if there is a conflict between the two. 
Please share this on Facebook and Twitter so that everyone can watch the Sierra Club director get exposed as a left-wing hack. What do you think of the Sierra Club director being exposed for supporting leftist causes not related to saving the planet? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
